Transformer(invisible, sense, mutual ele:
- First image: This diagram represents a neural network architecture, specifically designed for sequence-to-sequence tasks such as machine translation. It consists of two main components: an encoder and a decoder, which are connected by a shared attention mechanism. The encoder processes the input sequence to produce a hidden state that is then used by both the encoder and the decoder. The decoder uses this information along with its own internal states to generate the output sequence.

- Second image: A more detailed view of the multi-head attention mechanism within the encoder and decoder blocks of the neural network. Each block contains three sub-blocks: add & norm, multi-head attention, and feedforward. The multi-head attention allows the model to focus on different parts of the input sequence when generating a particular part of the output sequence.
